overview: Rock out with your cock out. Screwing groupies is a hobby as old as the hills, and in B. Skow's latest multi-media spectacular, you'll be taken backstage and onstage to right where the action happens. AVN calls B. Skow "the next major adult director." We call him number one with a bullet, and Groupie is his Woodstock for the wood generation! So grab your axe and play ... there's a groupie out there just waiting for your backstage pass!
title: Groupie
